heta saha anidda pawathwimata niyamitha thapal chanda salakunu kirima sadaha adala sewa sthanawala pahasukam salasana lesa therim bhara niladharin magin siyalu sahathika kirime niladharinta danwa athi bawa mathiwarana mahalekam karyalaya pawasayi.janadhipathiwarana thapal chanda salakunu kirima nirikshanaya sadaha aayathana dekakata pamanak awasara di athi bawa ema karyalaya sandahan karayi.ee anuwa pafral sanwidhanaya saha mathiwarana prachanda kriya nirikshana madhyasthanayata ee sandaha awasara labi thibe.thapal chanda wimasima sidukarana sthanawala aarakshawa sadaha adala niladharin polisiye sahaya illa sitiya hoth eeta sahayogaya labadena lesa polispathiwarayagen illa athi bawa sandahan we.heta saha anidda dedina thapal chandaya salakunu kirimata nohaki wu pudgalayanta labana 26 wani dina dakwa ema pahasukama laba gatha haki bawa da mathiwarana mahalekam karyalaya nikuth kara athi niwedanayaka dakwe.
